hero.title: Charity Fund “Angels of Tails”
hero.subtitle: Become an Angel for Tails with us

aboutUs.title: About the Charitable Fund
aboutUs.firstParagraph: helps homeless animals in frontline areas, where ensuring their survival is an extremely challenging task due to constant danger. Animals are often left alone during military actions, suffering from hunger and cold. The fund's mission is to provide animals with medicine, food, and vaccinations, as well as to give them a chance for rescue and hope for a decent life.
aboutUs.secondParagraph: Our mission is to break through people's indifference toward animals. People need to stop treating animals as objects because humanity lies in this understanding. The life of an animal should be valuable to humans! Animals deserve love and safety just as much as people do!

aboutOwner.title: About the Founder of the Fund
aboutOwner.firstParagraph: Eugenia Nikonchuk has been actively involved in charity work and animal protection for 10 years. She dedicated half of her life to sports, working as a fitness trainer, and later shifted her focus to helping homeless animals. Her journey began with rescuing a dog in 2022, and since then, Eugenia has become an active participant in public movements aimed at helping animals in frontline areas. She founded the "Angels of Tails" fund to organize assistance and expand it to reach more animals.
aboutOwner.secondParagraph: Her mission is to convey to people that
aboutOwner.boldText: animals are a part of Ukraine
